headline: Assessing Assurant (AIZ) Valuation After a Steady Multi-Year Share Price Climb
summary: Assurant (AIZ) has quietly rewarded patient shareholders, with the stock up around 16% over the past year and more than doubling over three years, even as growth remains relatively steady. See our latest analysis for Assurant. The recent 7 day share price return of 6.31% and 90 day share price return of 13.38% suggest momentum is building on top of Assurant’s already impressive 3 year total shareholder return of 102.01%. If Assurant’s steady climb has you thinking about what else might be...

headline: Assurant (AIZ) Is Up 6.3% After Earnings Beat And New Partnerships Boost Protection Programs – Has The Bull Case Changed?
summary: Assurant recently reported quarterly results that exceeded earnings and revenue expectations, while expanding its mobile device protection and extended service contract programs through new financial services partnerships. This combination of consistent earnings outperformance, enhanced product offerings, and comparatively attractive valuation metrics has supported more constructive analyst views on the business. We’ll now explore how Assurant’s latest earnings beat and product expansions...
